help:
Cmds: /scar [slot_name] /lcar [slot_name] /dcar [slot_name] /lscars
Keys: F6: lscars equivalent
Desc: scar is used to save a car, its mods and its color (not lights) to a slot lcar is used to spawn a saved car from the specified slot dcar is used to delete a slot (scar doesn't overwrite) lscars list the cars saved
